evidence.claim: Allied Digital uses AWS for cloud services.
The company ensures adherence to HIPAA standards in their health-tech solutions.
Allied Digital integrates EDI standards to facilitate healthcare transactions.
Utilization of Azure for data management solutions is mentioned in their developer docs.
HL7 standards are referenced in their interoperable health integrations.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on health tech integration with APIs and X12 standards aligns well with ICP use cases.
